channel.title: Project insanity webclient error
channel.description:
Well im trying to add a webclient to my site using this applet <HTML> [code]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Trapzpk</TITLE> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </head>
<BODY>
<applet name="Trapzpk" width="765" height="503" archive="http://www.dropbox.com/s/1shq97jat2q3ygv/client.jar" code="client"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>
</BODY> </HTML>[/code]
I always get a error saying classnotfoundexception client
I know the jar works because i can play the server with it, what did i do wrong? (NOTE: i jarred this and signed this correctly)

item.title: Project insanity webclient error
item.dc:creator: @TOMBROWV TOMBROWV
item.description:
@TOMBROWV wrote:

I fixed it my self, my dropbox had the wrong link lol thanks anyways guys!

Read full topic

@Mod_Groen wrote:

[code]

Trapzpk [/code]

This should work put the client.jar in the same place as your html
